Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.cards

Class AbstractGodCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.cards.AbstractGodCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicGodCard, PowerGodDecorator
public abstract class AbstractGodCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
AbstractGodCard is the class that represents the cards with God Powers, thus it is associated to a God and the corresponding description of its power. Each player owns a single card for the entire duration of the game.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • AbstractGodCard

      public AbstractGodCard​(java.lang.String godName, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String power)
      Non-default constructor, it initializes the card with the name of the god and its description.
      Parameters:
      godName - name of the god whose power has been chosen by the player
      description - description of the ability of the god
      power - the power of the god

    • cleanFromEffects

      public AbstractGodCard cleanFromEffects​(java.lang.String nameOfEffect)
      This method is used to clean the card from possible decorators which could block some functionalities. It is called when the blocker begins a new turn.
      Parameters:
      nameOfEffect - The effect that the blocker has activated by doing a determined action.
      Returns:
      The card cleaned by the blocking decorator passed as parameter.

    • initMove

      public void initMove​(GameSession gameSession) throws GameEndedException, GameLostException
      This method handles the move during a turn.
      Parameters:
      gameSession - This is a reference to the main access to the game database.
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - if the player decides to leave the game during his turn.
      GameLostException - if the player can't do any move.

      Throws:
      GameEndedException - if the player decides to leave the game during his turn.

    • askForMove

      public ActionResponse askForMove​(GameSession gameSession) throws GameEndedException, GameLostException
      This method asks to the client to move a worker.
      Parameters:
      gameSession - This is a reference to the main access to the game database.
      Returns:
      The response containing the choice of the player.
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - if the player decides to leave the game during his turn.
      GameLostException - if the player can't do any move.

    • askForMove

      public ActionResponse askForMove​(GameSession gameSession, java.util.HashMap<Coord,​java.util.ArrayList<Coord>> availablePositions) throws GameEndedException
      This method asks to the player for a move, between some positions already selected.
      Parameters:
      gameSession - This is a reference to the main access to the game database.
      availablePositions - The positions among which the player can choose where to move a worker.
      Returns:
      The response from the player about where to move a worker.
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - if the player decides to leave the game during his turn.

    • genericAskForBuild

      public DataToBuild genericAskForBuild​(GameSession gameSession) throws GameEndedException
      This method asks to the player where he wants to build.
      Parameters:
      gameSession - This is a reference to the main access to the game database.
      Returns:
      The data used to perform the build changing the model.
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - if the player decides to leave the game during his turn.

    • askForBuild

      public ActionResponse askForBuild​(GameSession gameSession, java.util.HashMap<Coord,​java.util.ArrayList<Coord>> availablePositionsBuildBlock, java.lang.String message) throws GameEndedException
      This method asks to the player where to build among some already selected cells.
      Parameters:
      gameSession - This is a reference to the main access to the game database.
      availablePositionsBuildBlock - The positions selected where the player can decide to build.
      message - The message sent to the player.
      Returns:
      The response from the player.
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - if the player decides to leave the game during his turn.

    • checkConditionsToWin

      public boolean checkConditionsToWin​(GameSession gameSession)
      This method checks if the player has won the game.
      Parameters:
      gameSession - This is a reference to the main access to the game database.
      Returns:
      True if the player won, false otherwise.
